author: Dave C
content:
Andreas, I agree with you, who needs a job if you already have one? For some time I have done exactly as you are doing and make my pics available under a Creative Commons license. They get used quite a lot, in all manner of online publications , including one or two on Wikipedia.
I'm not such as photographer as you are, I really just take snapshots of things that interest me and that I can use as illustration to my occasional blog pieces.
All of those that get used by others are from Flickr - that's the way people find them. Possibly other photo library sites would do just as well but I mainly use Flickr.
And the ones that get used most are those that illustrate things that there aren't too many free unposed images of. The most-used search term? Office Workers.
